verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>. Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>, and his praise <S%H8416><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of saints <S%H2623><s%>.
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in him that made <S%H6213><s%> him: let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in their King <S%H4428><s%>.
Let them praise <S%H1984><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in the dance <S%H4234><s%>: let them sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto him with the timbrel <S%H8596><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>.
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> taketh pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in his people <S%H5971><s%>: he will beautify <S%H6286><s%> the meek <S%H6035><s%> with salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Let the saints <S%H2623><s%> be joyful <S%H5937><s%> in glory <S%H3519><s%>: let them sing aloud <S%H7442><s%> upon their beds <S%H4904><s%>.
Let the high <S%H7319><s%> praises of God <S%H410><s%> be in their mouth <S%H1627><s%>, and a twoedged <S%H6374><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%>;
To execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and punishments <S%H8433><s%> upon the people <S%H3816><s%>;
To bind <S%H631><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> with chains <S%H2131><s%>, and their nobles <S%H3513><s%> with fetters <S%H3525><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>;
To execute <S%H6213><s%> upon them the judgment <S%H4941><s%> written <S%H3789><s%>: this honour <S%H1926><s%> have all his saints <S%H2623><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>.
